title: Iraqis thought they had a special relationship with the United States. Now they're furious over Trump's travel ban
text: "As for those Americans who are here, I think they should leave," he said. "If they don't want to back down, then they should leave, yes, even the fighters. I'm sure Russia will be willing to take their place and give us the support we need to defeat terrorism."
summary:
"As for those Americans who are here, I think they should leave," he said.
"If they don't want to back down, then they should leave, yes, even the fighters.
I'm sure Russia will be willing to take their place and give us the support we need to defeat terrorism."
